description: This is a React component that implements a note-taking application with features like theme toggling, note management (add, edit, delete), and state persistence via localStorage.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Switches between 'light' and 'dark' themes and updates the document's data-theme attribute.

methods.name: handleSelectNote
methods.description: Handles selecting a note, updating selectedId and resetting isAdding state.

methods.name: handleAddNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with a unique ID and adds it to the notes state, then selects it.

methods.name: handleSaveNote
methods.description: Updates the content of the currently selected note.

methods.name: handleDeleteNote
methods.description: Removes a note by ID from the notes state, and resets selection if needed.

methods.name: handleStartAdd
methods.description: Prepares the application to add a new note by resetting selection and setting isAdding to true.

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    const newNote = { id, title: note.title || "", content: note.content || "" };$/

fields.name: const newNote = { id, title: note.title || "", content: note.content || "" };
